1377670.name: The Ambassador: Fractured Timelines Soundtrack
1377670.description:
The Ambassador: Fractured Timelines Official Soundtrack is the perfect accompaniment to any evening full of mystery, fantasy, and ambition. Lose yourself in music by Tony Manfredonia; 18 tracks full of emotion and imagery evoking time-stopping combat and ethereal adventure.

  • 1. The Ambassador
  • 2. Sluagh Swamp
  • 3. Caor, the Greatest Sinner
  • 4. Everwood Forest
  • 5. Into the Red Fort
  • 6. Brawl with Commander Fergus
  • 7. Ascending Mt. Arawn
  • 8. Duel with Druids
  • 9. Dullahan & The High Priestess
  • 10. Tamaris in Ruins
  • 11. Fomorian Invasion
  • 12. Balor, Chief Fomorian
  • 13. The Acolytes of Avalon
  • 14. The Timelord
  • 15. Temporal Rift
  • 16. Credits - Feat. Nat Wlilow
  • 17. Enter the Bloodhenge
  • 18. A God Among Men
